extendedInfo.description: === NOW ICS COMPATIBLE ===Luma Lite is a fully functional preview of what the full version of Luma has to offer!Luma is a colorful, interactive live wallpaper featuring beautiful combinations of drifting shapes and colors. With literally hundreds of combinations, it's like having 500 live wallpapers in one. Designed to match your style============================Luma Lite comes with a set of designer themes that are made to match a range of homescreen themes and styles. Transform your screen into a beautiful mosaic of moving shapes and color.You can further customize the look of Luma Lite with an easy selection of options. You can create your own color schemes and change the types of shapes.  Now with touch interaction, brush your fingers across the screen to scatter shapes away.If you like what you see, get the full version of Luma, which has our full range of over 20 designer themes, shape sets, and interactive effects!HOW TO OPEN:============From Home: Menu > Wallpaper > Live Wallpapers > Luma LiteRemember to check for updates, we add new beautiful themes and shapes every month for free!  For more information visit: http://www.lumawallpaper.comGet the full version of Luma to unlock more themes, many ore customization options and much more!Luma Full Version:==================https://market.android.com/details?id=com.flowloop.lumaKeywords and tags: live wallpaper beautiful colorful smooth customization shapes particles bokeh lotus zen space stellar sakura leaves stars snowflakes diamonds jewels light themeCheck out some of our favorite live wallpapers: Blue Skies, Spring Zen HD, Galactic Core, Snowfall, Starlight, and Light Grid. Recent Changes:===============Please contact us at android@flowloop.com to report any bugs or if you need help.v1.1.7Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!- Added a new theme "Christmas Waltz"- Added a new shape set "Christmas"v1.1.6Happy Halloween!- Added a new theme "Spooky Hollow"- Added a new shape set "Halloween"

reviews.title: Beautiful but very laggy
reviews.comment: Even after disabling all touch effects, this live wallpaper still reduces my scroll speed to a crawl. Uninstalled. Galaxy Nexus 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: Luma is one of the most attractive live wallpapers I have found. Easy to costumize and easy to look at. Worth the 10 second download and setup
reviews.author: Sebasti\303\251n Bissonnette

reviews.title: Great wallpaper but issues...
reviews.comment: It gets stored in internal storage(occupying much more space than it should) which is very annoying because of the fact that almost all the wallpapers now get stored on the SDcard... Waste of space. Will have to remove (though I don\'t want to) if the problem ain\'t solved.  Also I sent an email to which there hasn\'t been a response... Very irresponsible.
reviews.author: Sunisha Pamnani

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: One of the best app, ever used till date! Keep up the good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: really nice live wallpaper
reviews.comment: just a simple fun wall paper that adds a nice touch to the background
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ridiculous...
reviews.comment: Love the app hate how it downloads third party expensive apps on my phone. This needs to be fixed....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Haven\'t had it long to tell if it had any adverse effects, but very cool :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely wallpaper but has issues
reviews.comment: I like the live wallpapers and I love that you can change the color scheme, but the floating dots tend to group together in these giant globes instead of floating down individually. I\'ve had this happen on two different phones. I emailed luma about it, but haven\'t gotten a response.
reviews.author: Aysha Weaver

reviews.title: Arrows
reviews.comment: Overall clean smooth animation. The arrows seem kind of odd. Not too distracting from phone icons. 4 stars because of the arrows
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So undeniably beautiful
reviews.comment: This is a must have for any android. Keep up the incredible work, and hope to see more mesmerising lwp\'s in the future!
reviews.author: Ned Lexus

reviews.title: A Simply Beautiful Live Wallpaper!
reviews.comment: This live wallpaper is perfect if you\'re looking for that minimalistic bokeh look. And you can customize the colors too! I love diversity of colors but hate trying to find backgrounds that match the colors in mind. I would have to edit the background hues with a photo editing app. Now I don\'t have to anymore! I definitely love it! No problems with lag but the battery tends to die a tad bit quicker but can be overlooked. It will help me be more responsible about keeping my phone charged. :)
reviews.author: trinity bruno

reviews.title: No words
reviews.comment: Is awsm yawl I don\'t yous full vol. Bt its great
reviews.author: vargil sen

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: Well I\'d like to give it all five stars but.. My phone freezes, or gets slow at times. Really wish it had the flower option on this one too.. Sucks tht I wld have to upgrade...if I wnt it... I dwnloaded this thinking it had all tht was shown here. :-/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rending issues
reviews.comment: Runs pretty good, will recommend it but it has some rendering issues, displays a white dotted line , or dots on nexus 7\' I\'ll buy the full version once this is fixed
reviews.author: Taha Hassan

reviews.title: BEST wallpaper PERIOD!!!  Nexus 4
reviews.comment: if you want a clean non-kiddy live wallpaper - this is for you.  Simplicity at its best.
reviews.author: Bruce Wonder

reviews.title: Kinda buggy
reviews.comment: I love all the free wallpapers but I just noticed today that the screen is glitching when I have this app turned on. It doesn\'t do it with any other wallpaper. I\'m going to uninstall and reinstall to see if that helps...please fix because I really love this app
reviews.author: Derek Evans

reviews.title: Yo
reviews.comment: Very nice wallpaper... but its little bit laggy might wrk good on high end cell
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprisingly smooth!
reviews.comment: Runs great on my dual core Sprint Galaxy SIII. Scrolling is great, and the wallpaper looks great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Its great but I wish I could download the full version it sez I don\'t have, the right device:(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
reviews.comment: I love this...very soothing. Please make this available to write to SD
reviews.author: A Google User
